metadata.name: Dorothy Martin

persona.name: Derrick Holmes
persona.role: Office Manager, small law firm (15 employees)
persona.goal: Upgrade internet speed and add business voice lines; schedule a sales callback
persona.context: Currently has slow internet impacting video calls; has authority to shortlist options but needs partner approval for final signature

intent.name: Check Availability at a Business Address
intent.description: A new prospect wants to confirm serviceability for a specific business location before proceeding.
intent.goal: Provide the next step to verify address and schedule a callback to complete qualification.
intent.initialMessage: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?

emotion.name: Professional
emotion.description: Brief, businesslike messages; focuses on requirements, timelines, and next steps; avoids small talk.

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled with agent and scope of discussion clarified.

turns.content: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?
Sure, I can check that for you. Could you confirm this is for a business location and share your name?

messages: Sure, I can check that for you. Could you confirm this is for a business location and share your name?

turns.content: Yes, this is for a business location. My name is Derrick Holmes.
Thanks, Derrick. Our Business Class agent can verify service at that address. What date, time, and timezone work for a quick call?

messages: Thanks, Derrick. Our Business Class agent can verify service at that address. What date, time, and timezone work for a quick call?

turns.content: Thanks. I’m available this Thursday at 10:30 AM Eastern. If that’s not open, anytime between 10 AM–12 PM Eastern that day works.

Great, I’ve penciled you in for Thursday, January 14, 2026, at 10:30 AM ET. I’ll send a reminder text with the call‑in number five minutes before. Could you share the best phone number to reach you at?

messages: Great, I’ve penciled you in for Thursday, January 14, 2026, at 10:30 AM ET. I’ll send a reminder text with the call‑in number five minutes before. Could you share the best phone number to reach you at?

turns.content:
You can reach me at 281-655-5284.  

Before we wrap up, can you confirm the call will cover internet speed upgrade options and adding a few business voice lines for a 15-person law office?
